entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -15.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -18.1°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
